metadata.name: WMIC Remote Command Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of WMIC to query information on a remote system

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wmic.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wmic.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/node:')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/node:127.0.0.1 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/node:localhost '))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of WMIC to query information on a remote system
